data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wallace, Robert Lee, Kordbacheh, Azar, Walsh, Elizabeth J. (2018): Key to the currently recognized species of Limnias Schrank, 1803 (Rotifera, Monogononta, Gnesiotrocha, Flosculariidae). Zootaxa 4442 (2): 307-318, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4442.2.7|9 occurrences
